{"title": "The Panic Room: Outrage", "title_search": "the panic room outrage", "title_keyword": "the panic room outrage", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/the-panic-room--outrage/", "summary": "«The Panic Room: Outrage» is more than just a hidden object game. It’s a suspense thriller and a philosophical parable all in one and wrapped up in an interactive form.Plot:You regain consciousness in some unfamiliar place. You can’t remember how you even got there, all memories seem to be lost in a dream. You find an audio tape on the bed and decide to play it, expecting it all to be some kind of prank from your friends. But what you hear from the loudspeaker is not your buddies’ merry voices, it’s a monotonous speech of a stranger that calls himself the Puppeteer. It makes three things clear to you. First, you have lost your freedom. Second, you may lose your life. And third, you are about to face the most severe trial in your life… Review quote:“The Panic Room gives a real nonlinearity, because the plot branches are different. That’s where the main highlight of the game is hidden. What is it? See for yourself.”(GameGuru.ru) About the game:«The Panic Room: Outrage» is more than just a hidden object game. It’s a suspense thriller and a philosophical parable all in one and wrapped up in an interactive form. Your task is to explore a huge Victorian mansion. By finding certain objects in its luxurious rooms and halls you will begin to learn more and more about the past of this place. Only its history, filled with tragedies, betrayals and murders, can give you the key to precious freedom. There are other prisoners like you. Some are going to help you, while others will try to hinder your plans. It all depends on who you side with. The Followers are trying to find a glimpse of sense or even some didactic experience in the actions of the maniac that runs the house, while the Underground is doing its best to oppose this madness.Features:- A true detective story, reminding you of Agatha Christie’s novels and the “Saw” films, has two alternative storylines. - Highly realistic graphics with detailed locations and objects.- Authentic retro-style design combined with atmospheric music and environment sounds.- Variety of game modes: hidden objects are waiting for you in “night mode”, “upside-down” mode and new unique “Ghosts” mode.- Additional brain-twisters, dozens of puzzles and caches, more than 100 collections and so on…- More than 17 original characters with their own history, temper and personal intentions.- Every update will provide new possibilities, game modes, characters and quests! - Add your friends to play together, help them and get their help. - Take part in the developer’s challenges and promotions arranged on a regular basis.- Play for free! Official group of «The Panic Room» game on «VK.com» website: http://vk.com/freedomcost_groupAn article about the development process: http://www.gamexp.ru/article.php?pid=900&sort=date&dir=desc&id=17", "genre": ["Hidden Object"], "metascore": 0, "critic_reviews": 0, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": "2013-07-11", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-288793-17.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-288793-17.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": null, "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": ["North America"], "companies": ["Fun Factory LLC (Developer)", "Fun Factory LLC (Publisher)"], "platforms": ["iOS (iPhone/iPad)"], "rating": null}

{"title": "Diamonds Mania 2 Next", "title_search": "diamonds mania 2 next", "title_keyword": "diamonds mania 2 next", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/diamonds-mania-2-next/", "summary": "Diamonds Mania, popular and loved by many gamers, returns! The best in its genre game has transformed and acquired great new features. Pick gemstones along to clear the field, earn points and bonuses. The more stones you pick at once, the more points and bonuses you earn. Your job is to pick gemstones of the same color. The goal, in its turn, depends on the game type you have chosen. In the tactical game, you will have to solve an uneasy problem and clear the game field, all to the last stone. In the second game type, you simply earn the required points and move to the next level. See how many points you are to earn on the Status Bar. In the time trial game, clearing the game field gives you both points and extra time. Dont forget to keep an eye on the Status Bar; here it indicates how much time youve got. Use special objects and additional opportunities to pass the levels quicker. Clearing the entire game field gives you an extra bonus. The simple gameplay is incredibly addicting, and draws you in without causing you to obsess.  The added benefit of hints within each level helps to make those extra tricky levels more manageable.  The quick levels means you can play for 5 minutes or 2 hours and feel truly entertained the whole time." - 4.5/5 - Mactrast.com FEATURES Freeplay Mode? 18,000 Levels (All 100% free).? iCloud Sync, continue where you left off on any device.? {"title": "Magic Assassin", "title_search": "magic assassin", "title_keyword": "magic assassin", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/magic-assassin/", "summary": "Magic Assassin is a real-time RPG that incorporates stealth and tracking.  Players use iOS devices to cast spells to attack and defend.This game can be played with 2-4 players.  Invite up to 3 friends to join a game.  Once the players have accepted the invitation and the game center has loaded, a radar screen will appear.  Each player is given a “target” which will appear as a red dot on the radar screen.  The other players (non-targets) will appear as green dots on the radar screen.  Each player is always at the center of their radar screen and will not appear as a dot.  The objective is for a player to get near enough to their target to cast a spell.  Once a spell is cast, the target will be alerted that they have been attacked, and will be prompted to cast a defensive spell.  Experience points are awarded for a successful attack as well as for a successful defense (more points are awarded for a successful attack than for a successful defense).  Success in attack or defense is determined by an RPG style calculation involving several upgradable properties.  As players gain experience points, they will be able to upgrade the strength of their spells, and increase their chances of casting successful spells (attack and defense).  Once a player has attacked their target, they will be given a new target (if there are more than two players in the game), and they will need to get close to them to cast another spell.  While a player is tracking down their target, they may also be hunted down by other players.  Every player is a potential threat.", "genre": ["RPG"], "metascore": 0, "critic_reviews": 0, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": "2013-02-12", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-269586-17.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-269586-17.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": null, "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": ["North America"], "companies": ["ModnaR Enterprises (Developer)", "ModnaR Enterprises (Publisher)"], "platforms": ["iOS (iPhone/iPad)"], "rating": null}

{"title": "This Could Hurt", "title_search": "this could hurt", "title_keyword": "this could hurt", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/this-could-hurt/", "summary": "You are an Oakguard apprentice. One day you will be a fully fledged Oakguard, charged with protecting the Great Oak—the tree that gives life and power to your Village. But first you must pass the Path of Pain.• OUCHAvoid spinning blades, pitfalls, giant mallets and more in this unique adventure. Control your character with one-touch controls, choosing the perfect time to stop or go.• WHAT AN ADVENTUREThis Could Hurt features four worlds, each with ten challenging levels.
